eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily

Class EF_ConditionalDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_ConditionalDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EF_BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents, EF_Multinomial_Dirichlet, EF_Normal_Normal_Gamma, EF_Normal_NormalParents, EF_NormalGivenIndependentNormalGamma, EF_NormalGivenJointNormalGamma, EF_UnivariateDistribution

    public abstract class EF_ConditionalDistribution
extends EF_Distribution
    This class extends the abstract class EF_Distribution and defines the Conditional Distribution in Exponential Family (EF) form.

    For further details about how exponential family models are designed in this toolbox, take look to the following paper: Representation, Inference and Learning of Bayesian Networks as Conjugate Exponential Family Models. Technical Report. (pdf)

    See Also:

      • getVariable

        public Variable getVariable()

      • getConditioningVariables

        public List<Variable> getConditioningVariables()
        Returns the list of conditioning parent variables.
        Returns:
        a list of Variable objects.

      • getExpectedLogNormalizer

        public abstract double getExpectedLogNormalizer(Variable parent,
                                                Map<Variable,MomentParameters> momentChildCoParents)
        Returns the expected value of the log-normalizer for a given parent according to the given moment parameters of the rest of parent variables (i.e., Co-Parents).
        Parameters:
        parent - the reference parent Variable object.
        momentChildCoParents - a Map object that maps parent Variables to their corresponding MomentParameters objects.
        Returns:
        a double value that represents the expected value of the log-normalizer.

      • getExpectedLogNormalizer

        public abstract double getExpectedLogNormalizer(Map<Variable,MomentParameters> momentParents)
        Returns the expected value of the log-normalizer according to the given moment parameters of the parent variables.
        Parameters:
        momentParents - a Map object that maps parent Variables to their corresponding MomentParameters objects.
        Returns:
        a double value that represents the expected value of the log-normalizer.

      • getExpectedNaturalFromParents

        public abstract NaturalParameters getExpectedNaturalFromParents(Map<Variable,MomentParameters> momentParents)
        Returns the expected natural parameter vector given the parent moment parameters.
        Parameters:
        momentParents - a Map object that maps parent Variables to their corresponding MomentParameters objects.
        Returns:
        a NaturalParameters object.

      • getExpectedNaturalToParent

        public abstract NaturalParameters getExpectedNaturalToParent(Variable parent,
                                                             Map<Variable,MomentParameters> momentChildCoParents)
        Returns the expected natural parameter vector for a given parent variable given the moment parameters of the rest of parent variables (i.e., Co-Parents).
        Parameters:

        momentChildCoParents - a Map object that maps parent Variables to their corresponding MomentParameters objects.
        Returns:

      • toConditionalDistribution

        public abstract <E extends ConditionalDistribution> E toConditionalDistribution()
        Converts this EF_ConditionalDistribution to its equivalent ConditionalDistribution object.
        Type Parameters:
        E - a subtype of conditional distribution of the final created object.
        Returns:
        a ConditionalDistribution object.

      • toConditionalDistribution

        public ConditionalDistribution toConditionalDistribution(Map<Variable,Vector> expectedValueParameterVariables)
        Converts this EF_ConditionalDistribution to a ConditionalDistribution object given a map of expected values. It assumes that the distribution is conditioned to parameter variables, thus its values are replaced with the given expected values.
        Parameters:
        expectedValueParameterVariables - a Map object that maps Variable to their corresponding expected values, i.e. Vectors.
        Returns:
        a ConditionalDistribution object.
